title: Tricked Steel
description: Patrick SteelThey call him Tricks.To me, he was the first man I ever felt I could trust.He annihilated all the stereotypes about men rooted in me, even when he so easily fit the mold. He wasn’t my type, not at all.I hated men …In my last life, anyway.Savvy SuttonI call her Savanah.It isn’t her name, but it made total sense.She didn’t know who she was, yet she held on to the lies she so desperately wanted to believe in, to save a part of herself.She tried to fight her attraction for me, and I made damn sure that didn’t happen.Then … she tricked me.Sometimes, the greatest love stories grow from lies.
author: M.J. Fields
